description: UI Bug Fixes - Fix run buttons, empty cells, radar chart colors, and language name mapping for F#/C#

userStories.title: Fix lock state persistence in API
userStories.description: As a user, I want my lock/unlock changes to persist so languages stay unlocked after page refresh.
acceptanceCriteria: POST /api/lock endpoint saves locked state to Languages/metadata.json
Verify metadata.json is updated with correct languageMetadata[lang].locked value
Test with curl: POST /api/lock with {lang: 'F_Sharp', locked: false} should persist
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Fix radar chart color to match score tier
userStories.description: As a user, I want the Performance Profile radar chart to use the same color as my score tier badge.
acceptanceCriteria: Find where drawScoreRadarChart is called and ensure tier parameter is passed
Tier colors: S=#ffd700 (gold), A=#00ff9d (green), B=#7aa2f7 (blue), C=#ff9e64 (orange), D=#f7768e (pink), F=#db4b4b (red)
Radar polygon fill and stroke use the tier color, not hardcoded
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser: open Score Modal, radar color should match tier badge color

userStories.title: Add run buttons to empty cells for unlocked languages
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see run buttons in empty matrix cells so I can populate benchmark data.
acceptanceCriteria: In HTMLGenerator.ts, render run button in cells even when no benchmark data exists
Run button only appears for unlocked languages (check isLocked)
Empty cell shows just the run button (no time/data)
Clicking run button triggers runSolver with correct language and matrix
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser: unlocked language with empty cells should show run buttons

userStories.title: Fix language name mapping for F# and C# in client
userStories.description: As a user, I want F# and C# run buttons to work correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Client-side runSolver function maps F# to F_Sharp before API call
Client-side runSolver function maps C# to C_Sharp before API call
Run All button for F# triggers correct API call with language='F_Sharp'
Run All button for C# triggers correct API call with language='C_Sharp'
Typecheck passes
Verify: click F# run button, check network tab shows language=F_Sharp

userStories.title: Ensure Run All button renders for unlocked special-char languages
userStories.description: As a user, I want C# and F# to show Run All buttons when unlocked.
acceptanceCriteria: HTMLGenerator checks lock status using display name (C#, F#) not directory name
When C# is unlocked, Total Time column shows Run All button
When F# is unlocked, Total Time column shows Run All button
updateRunButtonsForLockState handles special character languages correctly
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser: unlock F# via modal, Run All button should appear
